short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search selected text from Whois.com - Coded by Jarno Niemel√§

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select IP address or word from a web page and right click your mouse. From context menu choose WHOIS <selection> and do a whois lookup to your selection. If you select word/text instead of IP address, extension will by default search for .com address availability of the selection.

Extension uses Whois.com service for lookups.
